content: single_crochet in chain-2 space * 6 double_crochet p 6 double_crochet in next chain-6 space single_crochet in chain-2 space repeat from * around sl to top of beg chain 2 to join fasten_off and weave in ends block if desired you may not sell or reproduce this pattern without express written permission you may sell any items you create based on this pattern please credit jay s fiber studio in your listing i would love to see your creations tag me or use the hashtag #scarfofmanyminis let s connect tiktok @jayysenn jay s fiber studio instagram @jayysenn ravelry @jayysenn © 2024 jay s fiber studio 2
